DOC.brief_summary: Surgical Pleth index is a novel device aimed for measurement of intraoperative nosiseption. It has not been tested on small children. The aim of this study is to measure, whether there is a difference in nosiception measured by SPI in a group receiving local anesthetics prior to operation compared to group receiving plasebo.
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Pleth Index- Relevance in Small Children
DOC.criteria: age 02 years Elective surgery planned for inguinal hernia, or testicle retention Written informed consent from parent received ASA IIII Exstrasystolias, known cardiac problem, medication affecting rhytm, allergy to drugs used
